name: 10kΩ Potentiometer
description: Single-turn rotary potentiometer, 10kΩ, through-hole. Three pins: two fixed ends and a variable wiper. Use as a voltage divider for analog input to MCU (connect ends to VCC and GND, wiper to ADC pin), or as a variable resistor. Shaft protrudes through enclosure for user adjustment.

pins.label: End 1
pins.description: Fixed terminal 1. Use as one end of the voltage divider (e.g., connect to VCC).

pins.label: Wiper
pins.description: Wiper (variable output). Connect to MCU analog input pin.

pins.label: End 2
pins.description: Fixed terminal 2. Use as other end of the voltage divider (e.g., connect to GND).
